mapper.insert: insert into anime_scratch_log(host_id, anime_id, name, type, message, time) values(#{scratchLog.hostId}, #{scratchLog.animeId}, #{scratchLog.name}, #{scratchLog.type}, #{scratchLog.message}, #{scratchLog.time});
mapper.select: select count(*) as count, type from anime_scratch_log where date(time) = date(#{date}) group by type;
